name: SERVICE_PLAN_VERSION
description: The SERVICE_PLAN_VERSION table contains overtime information about service plans, which describe plans for recurring visits to address the care required for a patient.

columns.name: SERVICE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the service plan record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: SERVICE_PLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: PLAN_STATUS_PLN_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of this version of the service plan.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of this version of the service plan.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of this version of the service plan.

columns.name: COMMENT_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the version of the note record that contains the comment for this version of the service plan.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry when a record is edited
